subject: Basketball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Ten of the 14 players on the Knicks will be free agents this summer, and few, if any, will be back. Instead, the team will have salary-cap space  to spend on marquee players.
snippet: Ten of the 14 players on the Knicks will be free agents this summer, and few, if any, will be back. Instead, the team will have salary-cap space  to spend on marquee players.
